import React from "react"; import Header from "./Header"; import Main from "./Main"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import PopupWithForm from "./PopupWithForm"; function App() { function handleEditProfileClick() { isEditProfilePopupOpen(true) } function handleAddPlaceClick() { isAddPlacePopupOpen(true) } function handleEditAvatarClick() { isEditAvatarPopupOpen(true) } return ( <>
{/* EDIT PROFILE */} {isOpenEditProfile && } {/* ADD PLACE */} {isOpenAddPlace && } {/* EDIT AVATAR */} {isOpenEditAvatar && } ) } export default App;
